author: GameTimePA.com report
title: FIELD HOCKEY: Tuesday's roundup
text:
Northern goals — Armstrong 2, Speese, Hixenbaugh, Armstrong. 
Northern assists — Gerber. 
JV score — Shippensburg 0, Northern York 0. 
FORBES ROAD 12, MERCERSBURG 0 >> McKenzie Gelvin had a fine birthday, as she scored four goals and assisted on another two in a non-league victory for Forbes Road over Mercersburg Academy. 
Brittany Truax was also a big part of the offense for the Cardinals (15-2) with four goals and an assist, while Christina Parsons also had a hat trick. 
"It was just awesome passing," Forbes Road coach Carol Cline said. "We made great use of the great space that we could. The kids were very unselfish, which is why we have all those assists today." 
Mina Wilt finished with five assists for the Cardinals. 
Maya Miller and Kate Frimet split time in net for the Blue Storm, and racked up a combined 26 saves. Forbes Road 12, Mercersburg 0 Forbes Road
